info.title: FAIR Data Point API
info.description: The reference implementation of the metadata registration service: A service implementing the API specification. It contains an authentication system to allow maintainers to define and update metadata. Read-only access to the data is public.

get.description: Get Dataset
Get SHACL shape specification for Dataset
Get Dataset with its children
Get a page of Dataset children
Get metadata (memberships and state) for Dataset
Get members of a specific Dataset

put.description: Set membership for specific user in some Dataset

delete.description: Delete membership of specific user in some Dataset

get.description: Get FAIR Data Point

post.description: Inform about running FAIR Data Point. It is expected to send pings regularly (at least weekly). There is a rate limit set both per single IP within a period of time and per URL in message.

requestBody.description: Ping payload with FAIR Data Point info

get.description: Get SHACL shape specification for FAIR Data Point
Get FAIR Data Point with its children
Get a page of FAIR Data Point children
Get metadata (memberships and state) for FAIR Data Point

put.description: Change state of FAIR Data Point

get.description: getFAIR Data PointMembers

put.description: Set membership for specific user in some FAIR Data Point

delete.description: Delete membership of specific user in some FAIR Data Point
